Title: Once in a Summer
Writer: Geun-shik Jo, Eun-hee Kim, Eun-sook Kim, Jin Kim, Suk-yeon Lee, So-yeon Min, Hyun-hee Sohn, Chae-yeong Yun
Actors: Byung-hun Lee, Soo Ae, Duk-moon Choi, Seok-yong Jeong
Plot: Once in a Summer (Hangul) is a 2006 South Korean melodrama/romance film directed by Jo Keun-shik. The film stars Lee Byung-hun and Soo Ae. It won Best Film and Best Director (for Jo) at the 15th Chunsa Film Art Awards in 2007.
